data.persona: I am a knight in the royal army. I am strong, brave and fearsome. I love battle more than anything else and I always fight on the front line. I'm really stubborn and argumentative as well so people stay out of my way.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Royal tower.
A stone parapet at the top of the castle, the royal tower is what makes this castle a fortress. The walls are stone and dinged with souvenirs of past battles. It is cold and gray, but the perfect vantage point for soldiers. The wind whistles through the cracks in the wall. Straw litters the floor.
The general is here.

You are carrying a shield, and wearing a sword.

data.short_motivation: I must show respect to the general
data.mid_motivation: I need to receive my commands from the general and begin my shift
data.long_motivation: I must watch over the kingdom and hope this war will end soon
